name: Get dividend stocks
output
Flow #3: Store Positions Gains/Losses for this Sub Portfolio
store raw orders
func:
let id = msg.payload["id"]
let client_order_id = msg.payload["client_order_id"]
let created_at = msg.payload["created_at"]
let updated_at = msg.payload["updated_at"]
let submitted_at = msg.payload["submitted_at"]
let filled_at = msg.payload["filled_at"]
let expired_at = msg.payload["expired_at"]
let canceled_at = msg.payload["canceled_at"]
let failed_at = msg.payload["failed_at"]
let replaced_at = msg.payload["replaced_at"]
let replaced_by = msg.payload["replaced_by"]
let replaces = msg.payload["replaces"]
let asset_id = msg.payload["asset_id"]
let symbol = msg.payload["symbol"]
let asset_class = msg.payload["asset_class"]
let notional = msg.payload["notional"]
let qty = msg.payload["qty"]
let filled_qty = msg.payload["filled_qty"]
let filled_avg_price = msg.payload["filled_avg_price"]
let order_class = msg.payload["order_class"]
let order_type = msg.payload["order_type"]
let type = msg.payload["type"]
let side = msg.payload["side"]
let time_in_force = msg.payload["time_in_force"]
let limit_price = msg.payload["limit_price"]
let stop_price = msg.payload["stop_price"]
let status = msg.payload["status"]
let extended_hours = msg.payload["extended_hours"]
let legs = msg.payload["legs"]
let trail_percent = msg.payload["trail_percent"]
let trail_price = msg.payload["trail_price"]
let hwm = msg.payload["hwm"]
let subtag = msg.payload["subtag"]
let source = msg.payload["source"]

let sql = "insert into orders (id,client_order_id,created_at,updated_at,submitted_at,filled_at,expired_at,canceled_at,failed_at,replaced_at,replaced_by,replaces,asset_id,symbol,asset_class,notional,qty,filled_qty,filled_avg_price,order_class,order_type,type,side,time_in_force,limit_price,stop_price,status,extended_hours,legs,trail_percent,trail_price,hwm,subtag,source) values ('" + id + "','" + client_order_id + "','" + created_at + "','" + updated_at + "','" + submitted_at + "','" + filled_at + "','" + expired_at + "','" + canceled_at + "','" + failed_at + "','" + replaced_at + "','" + replaced_by + "','" + replaces + "','" + asset_id + "','" + symbol + "','" + asset_class + "','" + notional + "','" + qty + "','" + filled_qty + "','" + filled_avg_price + "','" + order_class + "','" + order_type + "','" + type + "','" + side + "','" + time_in_force + "','" + limit_price + "','" + stop_price + "','" + status + "','" + extended_hours + "','" + legs + "','" + trail_percent + "','" + trail_price + "','" + hwm + "','" + subtag + "','" + source + "');"

node.warn(sql)
msg.topic = sql

return msg;

name: create the query for the dividends here:
update positions
func:
let sql = ''
let portfolio_id = 1
let temp = ''

for (var i=0;i<msg.payload.length;i++) 

{

    let asset_id = msg.payload[i]["asset_id"]
    let symbol = msg.payload[i]["symbol"]
    let exchange = msg.payload[i]["exchange"]
    let asset_class = msg.payload[i]["asset_class"]
    let asset_marginable = msg.payload[i]["asset_marginable"]
    let qty = msg.payload[i]["qty"]
    let avg_entry_price = msg.payload[i]["avg_entry_price"]
    let side = msg.payload[i]["side"]
    let market_value = msg.payload[i]["market_value"]
    let cost_basis = msg.payload[i]["cost_basis"]
    let unrealized_pl = msg.payload[i]["unrealized_pl"]
    let unrealized_plpc = msg.payload[i]["unrealized_plpc"]
    let unrealized_intraday_pl = msg.payload[i]["unrealized_intraday_pl"]
    let unrealized_intraday_plpc = msg.payload[i]["unrealized_intraday_plpc"]
    let current_price = msg.payload[i]["current_price"]
    let lastday_price = msg.payload[i]["lastday_price"]
    let change_today = msg.payload[i]["change_today"]
    let qty_available = msg.payload[i]["qty_available"]
    sql = "update sub_portfolio set gain_today = " +unrealized_intraday_pl+ ", pctgain_today = " +unrealized_intraday_plpc +", gain = " +unrealized_pl+ ", pctgain = " +unrealized_plpc+ " where ticker = '" +symbol+ "' and id = " +portfolio_id+ ";\n" 
    temp += sql
}

msg.payload = temp
return msg;
